title: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
body:
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

I've tried everything, going on reddit, youtube, Lol site and nothings worked. I've even reinstalled a couple of times, tried different accounts, been to the troubleshooting connection for mac etc.

I'm on mac, osx el capitan

Please help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you currently on a wireless connection?
Yes, would that affect my connection?
Absolutely, sorry for the delayed response.
